title: Help with a friend, he thinks he is 'Best OCE'. (he is bronze V)
body:
**READ WHOLE POST BEFORE YOU START RAGING AT ME!**

I've got this friend, and he thinks he is like, the best player in OCE. I've tried to talk to him but he doesn't care what I say. He thinks he is Bronze V because he gets troll teams, but really he just doesn't co-operate. He says a so called 'Broken Champion' is hard, even though they are quite easy. Yes, he is better than me (far better!), I'm only LVL 27, but he really thinks he is 'The Best OCE'.


His Account (OCE): brodstar13579
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/3680352

replies.body: tell your friend he's bad and should uninstall.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qQQfsrjm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-23T12:16:53.218+0000)
>
> tell your friend he's bad and should uninstall.

Tomato, we've been mate for a while. But..

You're bad. You should uninstall.

> [{quoted}](name=jonifob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qQQfsrjm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-23T23:04:53.542+0000)
>
> Tomato, we've been mate for a while. But..
> 
> You're bad. You should uninstall.

no I'm not. I'm above average.

Challenger | Master | Diamond | Platinum | Gold | Silver | Bronze 
1                       2                3                4             5          6         7

Gold is the third lowest rank out of 7 ranks

Way to be below average XD, but as long as you're happy mate!

> [{quoted}](name=xianwenqi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qQQfsrjm,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-24T02:37:23.708+0000)
>
> Challenger | Master | Diamond | Platinum | Gold | Silver | Bronze 
> 1                       2                3                4             5          6         7
> 
> Gold is the third lowest rank out of 7 ranks
> 
> Way to be below average XD, but as long as you're happy mate!

that's not how averages work though. way to fuck up basic maths.
Nearly everyone in silver and bronze do
I checked your friend's profile and it seems to me that he is the best OCE. End of.
He only played around 20 games? He thinks he is stuck what?
Tell him, 'If you can rank up to bronze 4, then u r the best, if u cant, then something is wrong with u'
I've seen him play Tryndamere. He is the best B5 Tryndamere OCE - stop hating cos u just jelly
ur friend is shit hes ranked almost 100,000 places behind me if he got put in b5 its for a reason
No need to point him out then link him just to be a dick.
